document_data.caption: A map of Tu Pe showing the location of The Evening Mist Inn
document_data.name: The Evening Mist Inn.
document_data.mainbody: '''The T'u Ohmna Inn''' or '''The Evening Mist Inn''' was an inn in the city of [[Tu Pe]] in [[Koryo]] around [[1357 DR]]. It stood south of the city, just outside the city walls, by the Nokani Gate.
